title: Pool Party Ziggs Invisible Bombs
body:
I was playing a game of ARAM against a Ziggs with the Pool Party skin and around the time he got his Rabadon's Deathcap his bombs suddenly turned invisible, this was also noticed by a teammate of mine.

* His Q was invisible but you could see where it was bouncing through the splashes
* His W was invisible until it landed
* His Ultimate was Invisible entirely but still left the red circle on the ground
This is the 1st time I have seen it happen with Ziggs but I have also seen something similar happen with Sorceress Lux's E in ARAMs as well.

replies.body: This just happened to me against a pool party ziggs. Please fix it, it's cheating.

Hey Ranguver -- 

Thanks for the report! Does this occur in every game you see Ziggs/Lux?

It seems tied to Sorceress Lux and Pool Party Ziggs, but isn't in every game I play against said skins. I can go weeks without seeing it then have the issue show up in 3 or 4 games in a row vs those champs/skin combos.
Hmm. We've seen this randomly happen before, but without a solid repro, it's hard to determine what's causing it. Have you tried doing a client repair?
I have and it seems to help for a while but it always ends up returning.
